explains: v. 雇用；使用，利用；忙于，从事（be employed in）
n. 受雇（in the employ of）
wordGroup: employ in 被…雇佣；受聘于
in the employ of adv. 受雇于

sentences.en: How many people does the company employ?
sentences.cn: 这个公司雇用了多少人？

sentences.en: We employ an expert to advise on new technology.

sentences.en: We'll have to check him out before we employ him.
sentences.cn: 我们得先调查一下再雇用他。
